```{r}
n <- 10000
b0 <- 0.0
b1 <- 0.5
b2 <- 1.0
th <- 0.5

my_sim <- function(n, b0, b1, b2, th) {
   
   x1 <- rnorm(n, 0, 1)
   x2 <- rnorm(n, 0, 1)
   e  <- rlogis(n)
   
   l <- b0 + x1 * b1 + x2 * b2 + e
   p <- exp(l) / (1 + exp(l))
   
   dat <- data.frame(
      y = ifelse(p > th, 1, 0),
      x1 = x1,
      x2 = x2
   )
   
   glm(y ~ ., data = dat, family = binomial("logit"))
}


N <- 100
p <- 3
res_mat <- matrix(0, N, p)

for (i in 1:N) {
   res_mat[i, ] <- coef(my_sim(n, b0, b1, b2, th))
}

summary(res_mat)
MASS::truehist(res_mat[, 1])
MASS::truehist(res_mat[, 2])
MASS::truehist(res_mat[, 3])

LL <- function(pars, dat){
   b0 <- pars[1]
   b1 <- pars[2]
   b2 <- pars[3]
   l <-  b0 + dat$x1 * b1 + dat$x2 * b2
   # sum(dlogis(l, log = TRUE))
   p <- exp(l) / (1 + exp(l))
   # sum(dat$y * log(p) + log(p))
   # sum(dat$y * log(p) - log(1-p) + log(1-p) + log(p))
   mean(dat$y * log(p) + (1-dat$y) * log(1-p))
}


pars <- c(1, 2, 3)
LL(pars, dat)

opt1 <- optim(par = c(0, 0.5, 1), LL, control = list(fnscale = -1), dat = dat)
opt1

opt2 <- optim(opt1$par, LL, control = list(fnscale=-1),
              method = "BFGS", hessian = TRUE, dat = dat)
opt2


sigmoid <- function(z) {
   g <- 1 / (1 + exp(-z))
   return(g)
}


LL <- function(pars) {
   N <- nrow(dat)
   g <- sigmoid(as.matrix(cbind(1, dat[, -1])) %*% as.matrix(pars))
   J <- (1/N) * sum((-dat$y * log(g)) - ((1 - dat$y) * log(1-g)))
   return(J)
}

cost <- function(theta) {
   m <- nrow(dat)
   g <- sigmoid(as.matrix(cbind(1, dat[, -1])) %*% as.matrix(theta))
   J <- (1/m) * sum((-dat$y * log(g)) - ((1 - dat$y) * log(1-g)))
   return(J)
}

opt1 <- optim(par = pars, cost)
opt1
```
